member_organisations: Inserm Transfert is the private subsidiary of the National Institut of Health and Medical research (INSERM)  http://www.inserm.fr/inserm-transfert
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Competition, Consumers, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
- EU initiatives pertaining to pharmaceutical policy, Research and innovation policy, health policy (both human and animal)  
- H2020, IMI2 programs, ERC 
- Joint action: Health and wellbeing
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Private subsidiary of Inserm, Inserm Transfert manages every aspect of the promotion and transfer of knowledge obtained by Inserm’s research laboratories to industry, thereby helping to promote health innovation. Inserm Transfert focus on adding value and minimizing risk for innovative projects at pre-industrial stage, bridging discovery and clinical research. We put emphasis on identifying high-potential projects, implementing appropriate proof of concept and IP strategies, and setting up win-win/mutually beneficial industrial partnerships.
